languages.text: "Я и половины его речей не понимаю, но слышу, что он святых отцов изуверами зовет. Почему его еще блюстители не повязали?"

traits.locale_text: "Я и половины его речей не понимаю, но слышу, что он святых отцов изуверами зовет. Почему его еще блюстители не повязали?"

languages.text: "I don't understand half of what he says, but I hear him call the holy fathers monsters. Why haven't the enforcers arrested him yet?"
languages.original_text: "Я и половины его речей не понимаю, но слышу, что он святых отцов изуверами зовет. Почему его еще блюстители не повязали?"

traits.locale_text: "I don't understand half of what he says, but I hear him call the holy fathers monsters. Why haven't the enforcers arrested him yet?"
"I don't understand half of what he says, but I hear him call the holy fathers monsters. Why haven't the enforcers arrested him yet?"
"I don't understand half of what he says, but I hear him call the holy fathers monsters. Why haven't the enforcers arrested him yet?"
"I don't understand half of what he says, but I hear him call the holy fathers monsters. Why haven't the enforcers arrested him yet?"
"I don't understand half of what he says, but I hear him call the holy fathers monsters. Why haven't the enforcers arrested him yet?"

languages.text: «No entiendo la mitad de las cosas que dice, pero le oí llamar monstruos a los padres sagrados. ¿Cómo es que los guardias no lo han arrestado aún?».
languages.original_text: "I don't understand half of what he says, but I hear him call the holy fathers monsters. Why haven't the enforcers arrested him yet?"

traits.locale_text: «No entiendo la mitad de las cosas que dice, pero le oí llamar monstruos a los padres sagrados. ¿Cómo es que los guardias no lo han arrestado aún?».

languages.text: 「彼の言っている事はほぼ分かりませんが、聖なる神父たちを怪物呼ばわりしているらしいですね。なぜ執行官はまだ彼を逮捕しないんですか？」
languages.original_text: "I don't understand half of what he says, but I hear him call the holy fathers monsters. Why haven't the enforcers arrested him yet?"

traits.locale_text: 「彼の言っている事はほぼ分かりませんが、聖なる神父たちを怪物呼ばわりしているらしいですね。なぜ執行官はまだ彼を逮捕しないんですか？」

languages.text: “他说的话我有一大半都听不懂，但我听他管那些神父叫做怪物。那些执法者为什么还没有逮捕他呢？”
languages.original_text: "I don't understand half of what he says, but I hear him call the holy fathers monsters. Why haven't the enforcers arrested him yet?"

traits.locale_text: “他说的话我有一大半都听不懂，但我听他管那些神父叫做怪物。那些执法者为什么还没有逮捕他呢？”

languages.text: "Ich verstehe nur die Hälfte von dem, was er sagt, aber er bezeichnet die heiligen Väter als Monster. Warum haben ihn die Enforcer noch nicht verhaftet?"
languages.original_text: "I don't understand half of what he says, but I hear him call the holy fathers monsters. Why haven't the enforcers arrested him yet?"

traits.locale_text: "Ich verstehe nur die Hälfte von dem, was er sagt, aber er bezeichnet die heiligen Väter als Monster. Warum haben ihn die Enforcer noch nicht verhaftet?"

languages.text: « C'est à peine si je comprends la moitié de ce qu'il raconte, mais je l'ai entendu traiter les saints pères de monstres. Comment se fait-il que les prévôts ne l'aient pas encore arrêté ? »
languages.original_text: "I don't understand half of what he says, but I hear him call the holy fathers monsters. Why haven't the enforcers arrested him yet?"

traits.locale_text: « C'est à peine si je comprends la moitié de ce qu'il raconte, mais je l'ai entendu traiter les saints pères de monstres. Comment se fait-il que les prévôts ne l'aient pas encore arrêté ? »

languages.text: "Söylediklerinin yarısını anlamıyorum ama kutsal babalara canavar dediğini duydum. İnfazcılar neden tutuklamıyor bu adamı?"
languages.original_text: "I don't understand half of what he says, but I hear him call the holy fathers monsters. Why haven't the enforcers arrested him yet?"
